articles.author: Jessica Knibbs
articles.title: Coronavirus symptoms: Sixth most common symptom of COVID-19 increases death risk - Express
articles.description: CORONAVIRUS symptoms are more worrying when the elderly experience especially the sixth most common symptom of COVID-19 - delirium.
articles.content:
What is delirium?
Delirium is a serious disturbance in mental abilities that results in confused thinking and reduced awareness of the environment, said the Mayo Clinic.
